Journal.Title: American journal of physical medicine & rehabilitation

Article.ArticleTitle: What Are the Effects of Treatments for Sialorrhea in People With Motor Neuron Disease/Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis?: A Cochrane Review Summary With Commentary.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: From the IRCCS Istituto Ortopedico Galeazzi, Milan, Italy (MJDF); and Department of Biomedical, Surgical and Dental Sciences, University "La Statale," Milan, Italy (IB).

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Financial disclosure statements have been obtained, and no conflicts of interest have been reported by the authors or by any individuals in control of the content of this article.
